CustomField.description: The number of regions, practices, or groups to process in a single batch if the backlog remainder is processed in a separate batch. The default value is 50. Contact Certinia customer support before changing this value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of regions, practices, or groups to process in a single batch if the backlog remainder is processed in a separate batch. The default value is 50. Contact FinancialForce.com customer support before changing this value.
CustomField.label: Post Process RPG Batch Size
